trans-unit.source: Share the file you are working on.
trans-unit.target: Partager le fichier que vous êtes en train de travailler.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, Quick Pad couldn't open this file.
trans-unit.target: Désolé, Quick Pad ne peut pas ouvrir le fichier.
Design de l'icône par James Arney

trans-unit.source: Launch app into on top mode
Please consider leaving a review for Quick Pad in the store.
trans-unit.target: S'il vous plais, veuillez considérer de laisser un commentaire pour Quick Pad dans le magasin

trans-unit.source: Do you enjoy using Quick Pad?
trans-unit.target: Est-ce que vous appréciez Quick Pad?

trans-unit.source: Nothing to share, type something in order to share it.
trans-unit.target: Rien à partager, insérez quelque chose pour le partager.

trans-unit.source: Would you like to save your changes?

trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Show Status Bar on Classic Mode
trans-unit.target: Montrer la barre d'état en mode classique

trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: We moved the button here for a cleaner look! You can also press Control + Shift + F to leave focus mode.
trans-unit.target: Nous avons déplacé le bouton ici pour avoir un style plus propre. Vous pouvez aussi utiliser Ctrl + Maj + F pour sortir.

trans-unit.source: The button to leave focus mode button has been moved
trans-unit.target: Le bouton pour quitter le bouton de mode de mise au point a été déplacé

trans-unit.source: Restart required to apply the changes.
trans-unit.target: Un redémarrage est nécessaire pour appliquer les modifications

trans-unit.source: Automatically choose which mode to launch the app in based on the file type
trans-unit.target: Automatically choose which mode to launch the app in based on the file type

trans-unit.source: Please save your work before you import or reset settings.
trans-unit.target: Please save your work before you import or reset settings.

trans-unit.source: Use acrylic background for the text area
trans-unit.target: Use acrylic background for the text area

trans-unit.source: Some settings will not update until you restart.
trans-unit.target: Some settings will not update until you restart.

trans-unit.source: Prevent the app from closing when a crash occurs
trans-unit.target: Prevent the app from closing when a crash occurs

trans-unit.source: Save log reports when the app crashes
trans-unit.target: Save log reports when the app crashes

trans-unit.source: Send app health reports to App Center
trans-unit.target: Send app health reports to App Center

trans-unit.source: Give yourself a chance to save or copy your work, you will still need to restart as some functions may not work properly.
trans-unit.target: Give yourself a chance to save or copy your work, you will still need to restart as some functions may not work properly.

trans-unit.source: All your options are still here, we just moved them so that you could benefit from having the status bar in default mode as well.
trans-unit.target: All your options are still here, we just moved them so that you could benefit from having the status bar in default mode as well.

trans-unit.source: Default font color selected. Font color will change based on app theme.
trans-unit.target: Default font color selected. Font color will change based on app theme.
